Package org.opengis.metadata.content

Interface ContentInformation

All Known Subinterfaces:
CoverageDescription, FeatureCatalogueDescription, ImageDescription
@Classifier(ABSTRACT) @UML(identifier="MD_ContentInformation", specification=ISO_19115) public interface ContentInformation
Description of the content of a resource.
